meet Duckie Duckie is a grey tuxedo who loves belly rubs treats and his little brother Birdie PERIOD Duckuie can play fetch with his toys and his 



As many students as possible will try to squeeze into a car from West Virginia Universitys PRT system as part of the annual Mountaineer Week Challenge PERIOD

The competition known as the PRT Cram will take place Nov PERIOD  in front of the Mountainlair at noon said Sonja Wilson Mountaineer Week adviser in a press release PERIOD

 said Erin Blake a Mountaineer Week adviser and special events coordinator at the Mountainlair PERIOD

Members of WVUs student organizations form teams that compete during the Mountaineer Week Challenge though others who are not part of a team may participate in the PRT Cram as well she said PERIOD

The team that fits the most people into the PRT car wins the competition PERIOD

 Blake said PERIOD 

The PRT cars are designed to fit a total of  passengers between the eight seats and available standing room according to WVUs Transportation and Parking website PERIOD

The car used for the PRT Cram though is modified to have open windows PERIOD

The competition began in the 1970s and has been a  in Mountaineer Week Wilson said in the release PERIOD

This years PRT Cram is sponsored by The Ridge in conjunction with the Mountaineer Week Challenge which is sponsored by MedExpress PERIOD

When not being crammed with students the electricpowered cars provide a transportation option for students which connects the Universitys downtown Evansdale and Health Sciences campuses PERIOD
